Uses of SimpleServletSupport in org.cougaar.core.servlet
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.servlet that implement SimpleServletSupport
 class SimpleServletSupportImpl
          This is a generic API, provided by "SimpleServletComponent", that allows a Servlet to access COUGAAR Services.
 

Methods in org.cougaar.core.servlet that return SimpleServletSupport
protected  SimpleServletSupport SimpleServletComponent.createSimpleServletSupport(javax.servlet.Servlet servlet)
          Obtain services for the servlet, using the servlet as the requestor.
 

Uses of SimpleServletSupport in org.cougaar.planning.servlet
 

Classes in org.cougaar.planning.servlet that implement SimpleServletSupport
 class BlackboardServletSupport
           This support class offers additional services on top of the SimpleServletSupport class, including access to the blackboard, config finder, root factory, ldm serves plugin, and scheduler service.
